items.sentence: I wonder whether or not Tom and Mary will get married.

Mary knows everything about the latest fashion trends.

We\'ll have a good crop if this good weather keeps up.
That restaurant prepares two thousand meals every day.
That was the first time that a man walked on the moon.
Have you ever eaten at the restaurant where Tom works?
Tom was thinking about telling Mary that he loved her.
Tom was very tired and fell asleep during the meeting.
There\'s hardly any hope that he\'ll win the election.

They are going to give a party the day after tomorrow.
They attract customers by offering high-quality goods.
They decided that it would be better to start at once.
Nothing will happen to you as long as you\'re with me.
